### The Ology Trio

Data set : https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/sanyacodes/movies-dataset-netflix-prime-video-disney


# What's In It?

 This dataset contains information on movies available across four major streaming platforms: Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, and Hulu. It includes data points like: 

- Title 

- Genre(s) 

- IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes scores 

- Year of release 

- Runtime 

- Platform availability flags (True/False for each) 

The dataset is interesting because it allows us to analyze and compare streaming services based on their content catalogs, quality of available titles, and genre distribution. We can explore trends in movie ratings, exclusivity, and the evolution of content over time. 

---

## Introduction to the Data 

Streaming platforms are now the go-to for watching movies and shows, and each one has its own unique library. With all the competition for content, it’s more important than ever to understand what sets these platforms apart — not just in what they have, but in the quality and variety of their offerings. This dataset gives us a snapshot of what’s available on Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, and Hulu. By exploring the data, we can spot each platform’s strengths, see trends in genres and quality, and help people or companies make smarter choices when it comes to content.

---

### Questions We Plan to Ask (and Graphs to Make) 
1. Which platform has the highest-rated content overall (based on IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes)?

Bar graph comparing average ratings across platforms 

  
2. What are the most dominant genres for each streaming service?  

Stacked bar chart or genre heatmap 


3. How do the number of movies released per year vary by platform? 

Line graph over time 


4. Which platform has the most critically acclaimed movies (IMDb > 8 or RT > 90%)? 

Scatter plot or distribution chart 

  
5. What is the overlap of movies across multiple platforms?  

Venn diagram or matrix of shared titles 

6. Of each platform, what are the difference between age group recommendation?
  
Scatter plot by age
